title: Kale Caesar Salad With Chicken
ingredients: 12ounces curly kale, stemmed and cut into 1-inch pieces
4cups cooked chicken, sliced ¼ inch thick
directions: 1. For the salad Place kale in bowl, cover with hot tap water, and let sit for 10 minutes. Swish kale around to remove grit, then drain and spin dry in salad spinner. Pat leaves dry with paper towels if still wet.

2. For the dressing Process mayonnaise, ¼ cup Parmesan, lemon juice, anchovies, vinegar, Worcestershire, mustard, garlic, salt, and pepper in blender until smooth, about 30 seconds. With blender running, slowly add oil until incorporated.
3. Add dressing, croutons, and remaining ¼ cup Parmesan to bowl with kale and toss until well coated. Divide salad among individual serving dishes. Arrange chicken over salads. Serve.
